description: Disables a profile. When disabled, temporary credential requests with this profile fail. Required permissions: rolesanywhere:DisableProfile.

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the profile.

nested_items.name: acceptRoleSessionName
nested_items.description: Used to determine if a custom role session name will be accepted in a temporary credential request.

nested_items.name: attributeMappings
nested_items.description: A mapping applied to the authenticating end-entity certificate.

nested_items.name: mappingRules
nested_items.description: A list of mapping entries for every supported specifier or sub-field.

nested_items.name: specifier
nested_items.description: Specifier within a certificate field, such as CN, OU, or UID from the Subject field.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the profile was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account that created the profile.

nested_items.name: durationSeconds
nested_items.description: Used to determine how long sessions vended using this profile are valid for. See the Expiration section of the CreateSession API documentation page for more details. In requests, if this value is not provided, the default value will be 3600.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the profile is enabled.

nested_items.name: managedPolicyArns
nested_items.description: A list of managed policy ARNs that apply to the vended session credentials.

nested_items.name: profileId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the profile.

nested_items.name: requireInstanceProperties
nested_items.description: Specifies whether instance properties are required in temporary credential requests with this profile.

nested_items.name: roleArns
nested_items.description: A list of IAM roles that this profile can assume in a temporary credential request.

nested_items.name: sessionPolicy
nested_items.description: A session policy that applies to the trust boundary of the vended session credentials.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the profile was last updated.
